channel.title: Posts on Frankie Liu's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Frankie Liu's Site

item.title: Vim
item.description: Vim Vim Table of Contents Folding Folding Table 1. Vim folding commands Command Explanation zf#j creates a fold from the cursor down # lines. zf/ string creates a fold from the cursor to string. zj moves the cursor to the next fold. zk moves the cursor to the previous fold.

item.title: Visual Code
item.description: Visual Code Visual Code Table of Contents Docs Context menu Formatting Docs Documentation for Visual Studio Code https://code.visualstudio.com/docs?start=true Context menu The menu that comes us when you press right click what is the context menu in visual code - Google Search https://www.google.com/search?q=what+is+the+context+menu+in+visual+code&rlz=1C1CHBF_enUS811US811&oq=what+is+the+context+menu+in+visual+code&aqs=chrome..69i57.7140j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8 Formatting Shift-Alt-f: formats the buffer Last updated 2020-09-19 19:19:33 -0700 MathJax.

item.title: Windows Terminal
item.description: Windows Terminal Windows Terminal Table of Contents Setting up Color schemes Generate a manifest of schemes Default .json app Save default settings Add color schemes Reformat the .json file Change the color scheme vs Windows console Color scheme Adding a font Problems vs WindowsTerminal References console windows terminal fonts color schemes clipboard support launch links notepad++ Setting up Download WindowsTerminal from github.

item.title: Theme
item.description: baseof All the pages take off from this one single In particular, single can override some of the blocks of baseof adoc In order to get asciidoctor’s style to be retained, we disabled most of the styling.

item.title: Asciidoc
item.description: asciidoctor asciidoctor Table of Contents mathjax ditaa plantuml syntax highlighting a2s vega vegalite mermaid bpmn nomnoml There are things to note! mathjax \(E = mc^2\) \[\begin{equation} x^2 + y^2 = z^2 \label{eq:sample} \end{equation}\] This is a reference to the equation above \(\eqref{eq:sample}\). ditaa plantuml syntax highlighting app.
